summary: AN ORDINANCE submitting a proposition to the qualified electors of the City of Seattle, at the general election to be held on November 2, 1999, to change the heading of Article VIII of the Charter of the City of Seattle and to delete Article VIII, Section 13 and amend Article XVII, Section 3 of said charter to eliminate references to the Auditing Committee; ratifying and confirming prior acts; calling on the City Clerk to certify the proposed amendments to the Director of Records and Elections of King County and directing such Director to submit the proposition to City voters; and providing for the publication of such proposed amendment.
